scripts.dev: rm -rf lib dist && tsc -p tsconfig.dev.json && browserify ./dist/demo/index.js -o ./dist/index.js
scripts.server: npm run dev && cp demo/server/test.png dist/demo/server/test.png && node dist/demo/server/index.js

name: browser-speed-test
description: network speed test in browser with js
author: ShiverZheng
